/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding depth and structure to the image. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a warm and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant and varied, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
